title: Fuel Crossfeed Test
description: Comprehensive test to verify fuel crossfeed system operation
preconditions: Fuel tanks filled to test level
All required test equipment calibrated and available
Safety protocols reviewed and in place
test_steps: 9. Power down and secure test setup
expected_results: System shall verify fuel crossfeed system operation
No error messages or warnings displayed
actual_results: System partially verify fuel crossfeed system operation
notes: Test failed due to response time exceeding specification. Defect report DR-2025-0123 filed.
